import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; import { updateClientinDB } from "../../../actions/clientAction"; var initialArray = Array.apply(null, new Array(70)); const formData = new FormData(); export class profilclient extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { firstname: this.props.Client.firstname, lastname: this.props.Client.lastname, email: this.props.Client.email, phone: this.props.Client.phone, password: this.props.Client.password, age: this.props.Client.age, gender: this.props.Client.gender, avatar: this.props.Client.avatar, street: this.props.Client.street, city: this.props.Client.city, // Initially, no file is selected selectedFile: null, }; this.saveClient = this.saveClient.bind(this); } componentDidMount() {} saveClient(event) { event.preventDefault(); this.props.updateclient(this.props.Client._id, this.state); } onFileUpload = (event) => { // Update the state this.setState({ selectedFile: event.target.files[0] }) ? formData.append( "myFile", this.state.selectedFile, this.state.selectedFile.name ) : console.log(this.state.selectedFile); // Create an object of formData // Update the formData object // Details of the uploaded file console.log(this.state.selectedFile); }; render() { return (

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ CurrentUser: state.CorruntUSer, }); const mapDispatchToProps = { updateclient: (id, client) => updateClientinDB(id, client), }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(profilclient);
